mapper.sql: SELECT bno, state, title, "content", writer, private, reg_date FROM tb_board
mapper.delete: delete from tb_board where bno = #{bno} and writer = #{writer}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public.tb_board (title, content, writer) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: order by reg_date desc, bno desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
